dj.name: Fizzmaster Frank
introLines: Welcome back, wanderer. This is Fizzmaster Frank, broadcasting from somewhere the Geiger counter won't find me.
If you're hearing this, congratulations — you're still alive. Let's keep that streak going.

ads: This broadcast is brought to you by Atomic Fizz — the only soda guaranteed to glow brighter than your future.
Tired of raiders? Try not living near raiders. This message paid for by the Wasteland Tourism Board.
Remember: if your Geiger counter clicks more than your Pip‑Boy buttons, seek medical attention immediately.
interstitials: Hold tight, survivor — more tunes coming after this.
Don't wander too far. The wasteland has a way of wandering back.
If you see a glowing cap on the ground… maybe don’t pick it up.
